title: Veto Parameter Configuration Schema
description: Defines the structural requirements for configuring veto parameters within the governance system.

vetoThreshold.description: The minimum required consensus percentage (0.0 to 1.0) to successfully enact a veto.

vetoWindowCycles.description: The number of operational cycles during which a veto proposal remains active.

immutableTargets.description: A list of module identifiers that are exempt from the veto mechanism (e.g., kernel.js).
